ygData.subject: Re: Ghoulbane
ygData.msgSnippet: I d love it if this was true, but I doubt that your team is killing the right Froglock.  The Froglock Lord is one tough kermit - I m not planning on going
ygData.messageBody:
I'd love it if this was true, but I doubt that your team is killing the right Froglock. The Froglock Lord is one tough kermit - I'm not planning on going there to try until I hit L30.

-----Original Message-----
From: RangerDest@... [mailto:RangerDest@...]
Sent: Monday, 10 May 1999 2:25 PM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Ghoulbane


From: RangerDest@...

Well, I found out that the actual monster that carries Ghoulbane is
only 18-20. Not really sure, but perhaps a bunch of 15s could take em. When
my friends (cleric, ranger, monk) went there they killed him 5 times, he
carried a sword each time and it was rusty each time. What I figure is that
either the killer MUST be a paladin or that the group responsible for the
kill must have a paladin inside it. I have yet to goto Guk, and frankly I
don't look forward to having to dodge the troll bashers, so I am unable to
prove or disprove my two theories.

-Adaron
